ygData.messageBody:
> From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
> Subject: RE: Song Taunting.
>
>
> I haven't had many examples of 'bard hate' or whatever we want to call it
> lately, but this was sure pretty apparent as a bizarre hate list incident.
> Only thing I can figure is that somehow the code is messed up to the point
> that when a song pulses, the mobs consider it cast on everything within
its
> radius, whether it has an effect or not.

A legend from early in the beta that I can't verify:
Bard songs would affect all PCs in the radius, not just the ones in your
group.

When they "fixed" bard songs so they only affected party members, they may
have inadvertantly left the taunt factor on for all PCs. This is probably
the reason for 95% of "bard hate" cases. The other 5% are just random
attacks that are suffered by all classes.


Wayne
